title: Cover Swashes
content:
Good Morning!  
Here I am again. I don't appear online for a long time, other things to do!  
Anyway, here I am again with a new doubt.

I'm about to make a new cover for an old book, so my idea was kind of a revival.  
I want to bring back the old cover swashes... done by all the great leaders and pioneers of the type.  
So, i'm here to ask you to help me on this research... Things to look for and so on.

Appreciated,  
Joel Santos
author: sendoushi
